com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl

Class TopicDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl.AbstractDao<Topic>
      • com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl.TopicDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<Topic>, TopicDao

    class TopicDaoImpl
extends AbstractDao<Topic>
implements TopicDao
    Class which implements CRUD and several other operations to work with database topics.
